channel.title: When players logged in it crashed
channel.description:
hi, i added to my server a command for when a player with rigths =1 loggs in it says,
THIS PLAYER HAS LOGGED IN
however, adding this to my server resulted in it crashing and nulling all players ...
how can i correclty add this
thanks
